history neurologic disease , cancer , cardiac , respiratory , metabolic , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal ( except appendectomy cholecystectomy ) , dermatological , venereal , hematological disorder disease Have creatinine clearance ( CrCl ) less 80 milliliter per minute ( mL/min ) Show evidence significant active neuropsychiatric disease opinion investigator Show evidence hepatitis B
